The Tech Academy Podcast: Interview with Erik Gross

Normally I'm the host of The Tech Academy Podcast. Here, we switched it up and I was the guest. We talk about the launch of three new books that Jack Stanley and I wrote - and there's a bit of personal and company history in there as well.
